Body:
self.PL.ColorCorrectType = 'minimum'
lowest = max(self.PL.image[..., 0].min(), self.PL.image[..., 1].min(), self
    .PL.image[..., 2].min())
self.assertTrue(lowest > 0)
self.PL.color_correction()
lowest = max(self.PL.image[..., 0].min(), self.PL.image[..., 1].min(), self
    .PL.image[..., 2].min())
self.assertTrue(lowest == 0)
